text: Adjusted project browser organization: views are now grouped by discipline → phase → detail level for easier navigation.
Updated door families: added a new “Hardware Set” parameter for better scheduling in specifications.
Revised title block family: added QR code option linking to cloud-hosted PDF set.
Optimized view templates: coordinated graphics for structural plans to reduce inconsistencies in line weights.
Created new material library entry for “Architectural Concrete – Polished” with consistent rendering appearance.
Updated wall type definitions: corrected thermal values in schedules to match new sustainability guidelines.
Added annotation family for fire-rating tags with automatic link to door and wall parameters.
Improved mechanical equipment family connectors: corrected flow direction and standardized connector sizes.
Introduced shared parameters file v2.1: streamlined naming conventions and removed duplicates.
Fixed default project template units: updated imperial/metric toggle and corrected project north orientation.
